      • Method Detail

        • static FileObject addRelativePath(FileObject fo, java.lang.CharSequence cs)

          Allows a child path to be appended to an existing URI. Additional query parameters or fragments are not allowed and will result in an exception.

          Returns:
          A new path with the child path appended. All non-VFS query string parameters will remain intact and all existing properties will be inherited.
          Parameters:
          uri - Parent URI
          cs - Relative path to be appended
          Since:
          1.0
          Throws:
          URIException if additional query parameters or fragments are found.

        • static URI addRelativePath(URI uri, java.lang.CharSequence cs)

          Allows a child path to be appended to an existing URI. Additional query parameters or fragments are not allowed and will result in an exception.

          Returns:
          A new path with the child path appended. All non-VFS query string parameters will remain intact and all existing properties will be inherited.
          Parameters:
          uri - Parent URI
          cs - Relative path to be appended
          Since:
          1.0
          Throws:
          URIException if additional query parameters or fragments are found.

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static java.lang.Object buildOptions(java.util.Map options, FileSystemManager fsMgr, FileSystemOptions baseFSOpt = null)

          Traverses a map extracting keys in the form of 'vfs.SCHEME.FSOPTION'. Keys not of this form or not supported by the current file system manager will be ignored. @{code org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemOptions}).

          Returns:
          An implementation-dependent object of options (current
          Parameters:
          options - A map of options with keys in the form of 'vfs.SCHEME.FSOPTION'.
          options
          fsMgr - File system manager
          baseFSOpt - If supplied this is used as the initial file system options

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static java.lang.Object buildOptions(URI uri, FileSystemManager fsMgr, FileSystemOptions baseFSOpt = null )

          Extracts property information from a URI object and returns a FileSystemOptions instance @{code org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemOptions}).

          Returns:
          An implementation-dependent object of options (current
          Parameters:
          uri - URI object
          fsMgr - File system manager
          baseFSOpt - If supplied this is used as the initial file system options

        • static boolean localScheme(java.lang.String scheme)

          Checks whether the scheme is considered to be a local file system

          Returns:
          True if local filesystem scheme
          Parameters:
          scheme - Schemt o be checked
          Since:
          1.0

          Checks whether the URI is local within the context of the given file system manager.

          Returns:

          Parameters:
          uri - URI instance to be checked
          fsMgr - File system manager
          Since:
          1.0

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static FileObject resolveURI(java.util.Map properties = [:], FileSystemManager fsMgr, FileSystemOptions defaultFSOptions, java.lang.Object uri)

          Resolves a file from a URI.

          Returns:
          Returns an implementation-dependent VFS-located object (currently org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject).
          Parameters:
          properties - Map of 'vfs.SCHEME.OPTION' properties. ANy options passed in here will override options in defaultFSOptions.
          fsMgr - Apache VFS FileSystemManager instance
          defaultFSOptions - Default filesystem options that is used as a baseline
          uri - URI instance or something that can be converted to a URI

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> selectVfsOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> options)

          Returns a map only containing vfs options

          Returns:
          Filtered Map
          Parameters:
          options - Map with any kinds of options including options starting with vfs.

        • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic static java.lang.Object setOption(java.lang.String scheme, java.lang.String opt, FileSystemManager fsMgr, FileSystemOptions fsOpt, java.lang.Object v)

          Sets a single option on a FileSystemOptions instance @{code org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemOptions}).

          Returns:
          An implementation-dependent object of options (current
          Parameters:
          scheme - The ip scheme to set the option on i.e. 'ftp'
          opt - The specific option to set i.e. 'passiveMode'
          fsMgr - The current virtual file system instance that is in use
          fsOpt - The file system options instance associated with the VFS that needs updating
          v - The object value that the option needs to be updated to

          Parameters:
          f - Directory to use

          Parameters:

        • static FileName validURI(URI uri, FileSystemManager fsMgr)

          Checks whether the URI is valid within the context of the given file system manager.

          Returns:
          An implementation-dependent type if the URI if valid
          Parameters:
          uri - URI instance to be checked
          fsMgr - File system manager
          Throws:
          FileSystemException if not valid
